answers.answer: Forgot to mention:   problem has gotten better but they are still there.

question: I am 63.  My skin is sagging a little along the jawline but otherwise in good shape:  smooth and no wrinkles.  The other morning I woke up and had huge bags under my eyes.  They hung down to my cheeks.  This has never happened before.  What would cause this?type 2 diabetesStage III kidney diseasenever been a smoker or a sun batherno changes in meds(never used street drugs)don't drinkhaven't been sickno dietary changesstressed and haven't had much sleep lately
title: Sudden appearance of under eye bags
